Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: 10% off house brands at all Cold Storage, Giant and Guardian stores.
Earn up to 10% SMART$ rebate for all retail and online transactions made at Cold Storage, Market Place, Jasons, Giant and Guardian.
Earn 0.5% SMART$ rebate all transactions at over 600 participating outlets and use it to offset subsequent purchases.

Details.Name: sc_promotion_details
Details.Feature: S$50 Cash Credit for your first UOB card

Details.Name: sc_promotion_cond
Details.Feature: 1. Limited to first 600 applicants who had never held a UOB Principal Card in the last 6 months prior to 1 Jan 2016. 2. Charge a minimum amount of S$600 within the first 30 days of card approval. 3. Promotion is not valid for UOB PRVI Miles American Express® Card, UOB PRVI Miles World MasterCard Card and UOB PRVI Miles Visa Card application. 4. Promotion period from 1 January 2016 to 31 March 2016.

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: enjoyable at Giant IMM, Parkway, Tampines and VivoCity.

Details.Name: sc_grocery_details
Details.Feature: 3% or 8% rebate at Cold Storage, Market Place, Jasons, Giant and Guardian (in SMRT$) with min. spend of $400/month or $800/month
10% Off House Brands at Cold Storage, Giant and Guardian
Up to 3% rebate on contactless payments and recurring bills
Free home delivery at Giant IMM, Parkway, Tampines, VivoCity with S$150 min. spend in a single receipt

Details.Name: sc_petrol_details
Details.Feature: Up to 14% Petrol Discount + 2% rebate at Caltex
Up to 20% Petrol Discount at SPC (10% SPC&U Card discount + 5% UOB Card + $3 off every $51 nett spend (5%))

Details.Name: sc_shopping_details
Details.Feature: Up to 20% SMART$ rebate at over participating outlets islandwide including Adeva Spa, O.P.I., Hard Rock Cafe, EpiCentre, Cathay Cineplexes, Tissot, AirAsia and many more
